content:
This build was released on the 19th of August, 2021.
There are no differences between the Mario and Luigi versions of this build.
Bowser's Floor is now accessible.
This verision added new beta movement:
 - Inability to turn in water
 - Fast ground pound 
 - Flying when shot out of a cannon
 - Regeneration

New areas:
Course 7 Area 2: Peaceful Sewer Maze
Course 11 Area 4: Cool, Cool Mountain (beta)
Secret 2 Area 6: [peaceful sewer maze again?]
OW-1 Area 6: Bowser Hallway
